LanguageData.DesignatorKillZoneDesc: Create an area which will automatically designate pawns to be killed by packs.
LanguageData.CommandAllowMarkForKillDesc: Allows pawns to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowUnmarkOutsideOfZoneDesc: Unmark pawns that move outside this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackAnimalsDesc: Allows animals to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackHumanlikesDesc: Allows humanlikes to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackMechanoidsDesc: Allows mechanoids to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackEntitiesDesc: Allows entities to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackHostilesDesc: Allows hostile pawns to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowAttackNeutralsDesc: Allows neutral pawns to be marked for kill in this zone.
LanguageData.KillZoneTickInterval: Interval between checking pawns in zone
